blogproject.title: Blog Project
blogproject.description: This is a blog website created using ASP.NET Core 7 and EntityFramework

monkeytypewriter.title: Shakespearean Monkeys
monkeytypewriter.description: A program that tests the theory of whether a monkey randomly typing out letters can write every word in Shakespeare's Hamlet

checkers.title: Online Multiplayer Checkers
checkers.description: This program is designed to allow two different players play a game of Checkers through an established TCP connection.
